resources.string: This is an application developed for a research project conducted by ALPS. Using this application, you will be recording your device usage and share the data with us anonymously. This is a valuable contribution for us and we thank you very much for your participation. \n\nTo start the application, please hit the \'Next\' button.

There will be a consent text here.
You need to give consent before participating.
Please select at least one sensor from below available sensor list. \n\nYou will be then asked to give permission for us to observe the sensors you have selected (if not granted before, or rejected)
Either you haven\'t selected an available sensor or you rejected permission for one. In order to continue please follow our guideline.
In this screen, you can see your \'%1$s\' sensor data for the last %2$d days. Over this period of time, your average use of this sensor was %3$.3f hours/day.

In order to collect your data on %1$s, we do need your consent. The data collected on this sensor will be stored locally and uploaded to our servers. This data will not be illustrated with your personal identity in any way, and it will solely be used for our research. Do you give your consent for us to collect data on %2$s?
%1$s seems to be disabled. Do you want to turn it on?
Due to security measures taken by Google, we are not allowed to turn on %1$s on your behalf. Please turn on the sensor if you would like to collect data.
The service is enabled and currently collecting data.
